hey how come itunes is saying it wont play on my 120gb ipod? i thought that mp4 is the right format to play videos on. can anyone help? thanks

You should check the maximum display resolution both audio/video and see if your ipod is capable of playing it. simply being an .mp4 doesn't garauntee it will play. it just means the play has the correct codec to play it. the device itself might not have suitable hardware, or may have ristrictions. 

just a thought. i've had to configure .mp4 down from original to 320x240 to be able to play ony my phone
